org.spongepowered.api.util.gen

Interface MutableBlockBuffer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BlockBuffer

    public interface MutableBlockBuffer
extends BlockBuffer
    A mutable buffer for BlockType data. This buffer has no direct relation to the world and changes to it are not synchronized to the world.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fill(BlockState block)
      Fills the entire buffer with the given block.
      ImmutableBlockBuffer getImmutableClone()
      Returns an immutable copy of this block buffer.
      void setBlock(int x, int y, int z, BlockState block)
      Sets the block in the buffer at the given position.
      void setHorizontalLayer(int y, int height, BlockState block)
      Sets all horizontal layers between y (inclusive) and y+height (exclusive) to the given block type.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.util.gen.BlockBuffer

        getBlock, getMaxBound, getMinBound, getSize

    • Method Detail

              int y,
              int z,
              BlockState block)
        Sets the block in the buffer at the given position.

        void setHorizontalLayer(int y,
                        int height,
                        BlockState block)
        Sets all horizontal layers between y (inclusive) and y+height (exclusive) to the given block type.
        Parameters:
        y - The starting Y position
        height - The height
        block - The block type
